title: RBIA Drift Metrics Schema v1
description: Schema capturing feature-level drift statistics and thresholds for RBIA monitoring.

feature_id.description: Unique name or identifier of the monitored feature.

stat_test.description: Statistical test used for drift detection (e.g., PSI, KS).

value.description: Calculated drift statistic value (e.g., PSI score).

threshold.description: Threshold above which drift is considered significant.

decision_ts.description: Timestamp when drift test was executed.

model_id.description: Optional model identifier associated with this drift metric.

metadata.description: Additional fields such as baseline_version, sample_size, or alert_flag.
